title: I spent 1 hour trying to figure out 1 maths question.

replies.body: My day has been decent. Still another 5 hours of school left.
All my friends are solving maths problems, and I'm just sitting here masticating.

> All my friends are solving maths problems, and I'm just sitting here masticating.

I wish I was masticating, I'm so hungry.

You could have solved it in a mere microsecond if you had Rav's Magic Red Drink™!

{{item:2037}}

Solved all the problems to the world with Rav's Magic Red Drink™

Ty{{item:2037}}

Highschool or uni math?

Either way, if you're stuck you should have read answers if there is any or just leave it and move on to something else so you come back later or ask somebody else.

Just sitting there is a waste of time, might as well go play games, surf youtube or whatever.

The reason to why you're stuck is either that you are not familiar with the logic or simply you don't know about that particular logic hence when you have absolutely no idea and it's taking too long, get some help instead.
I spent all day playing league and avoiding life.
